COMMENT_TX: $Yankees challenged call that Bird was out at home; call was upheld - out
$Astros challenged call that Gardner was safe at 3rd; call was overturned - double and out stretching
$umpires reviewed play to see if there were fan interference on Correa's hit; call was upheld - home run
$Yankees challenged call that Headley was not hit by 4th pitch; call was upheld - strike
$Astros challenged call that Gregorious was safe at 1st; call was overturned - ground out
$Yankees challenged call that Judge was out returning to 1st; call was overturned - safe, no DP

$Judge had gone one step past second on Sanchez's fly ball and did not retouch second on the way back to first; Astros were preparing to challenge the missed base when Judge took off for second; if he had made it, then the Astros could not have challenged the second base play
$Astros challenged call that Headley was safe at 2nd; call was upheld - safe
$Yankees challenged call that Castro was not hit by pitch; call was overturned - hit by pitch
$Yankees challenged call that Headly was out at first, claiming Gurriel did not have foot on base; call was upheld - ground out
